hey will prevail!Sumra Dume <duck@...> wrote: > > > Colleagues,Thank you fo=

re of these events it is inappropriate to discuss the matter in a public fo=
rm such as this. Please do not speculate on the nature of this event. I am =

continued Panasonic RR DR-60 IC recorder + potentially increase in value! W=
hy not even post a Modified RS 12-469 on EBAY and see what happens!? Let's =
